Hon. the Earl Curzon 5 The Rt. Hon. G.N.Barnes, M.P.,of Kedleston, X.G., G.C.S.I., jG.C.I.E., 1j Lt.-Gen. the Right Hon. J.C.Smuts,The Rt. Hon. A. Sir M.P.A.Hankey, K.C.3.,Secretary, War Cabinet.WAR CABINET
